source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:

whole fruit, whole grain cereals, whole pulses, flax seeds and oat bran as they help 
control blood sugar levels
 ∙ Drink water, buttermilk, soups, and other unsweetened healthy beverages instead of 
soda or fruit juices 
 ∙ Intake of processed foods, rich in fat, salt and sugar should be restricted specially pickles, 
chutneys, murabbas
 ∙ Regular physical activity must be encouraged (e.g., yoga, walking, etc.) like 30 minutes 
of walk, two times a day.
